title: Check Story Against the Day's News Budget
description: An editor reviews the list of stories planned for the day (the 'news budget') to ensure there is a good mix of topics and no overlap.

tasks.description: Review the list of all stories scheduled for publication today.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a full overview of the day's planned content.

tasks.description: Identify if there are too many stories on one topic (e.g., politics) and not enough on another (e.g., arts).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies an imbalance in the coverage.

tasks.description: Decide to hold one of the politics stories for the next day and assign a reporter to find a quick arts story to fill the gap.
tasks.expected_outcome: The news budget is adjusted for better balance.
